containerDefinitions.name: db-init
command: PGPASSWORD=admin123 psql -h localhost -U admin -d microservices_db -c "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS products (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, category VARCHAR(100), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS inventory (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, product_id INTEGER NOT NULL UNIQUE, quantity INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, warehouse VARCHAR(100), last_updated TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE CASCADE); CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_products_category ON products(category); CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_inventory_product_id ON inventory(product_id); INSERT INTO products (name, description, price, category) SELECT 'Laptop Dell XPS 13', 'Ultrabook potente y ligera', 1299.99, 'Electronics' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM products WHERE name = 'Laptop Dell XPS 13'); INSERT INTO products (name, description, price, category) SELECT 'Mouse Logitech MX Master', 'Mouse ergonomico inalambrico', 99.99, 'Electronics' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM products WHERE name = 'Mouse Logitech MX Master'); INSERT INTO products (name, description, price, category) SELECT 'Teclado Mecanico', 'Teclado mecanico RGB', 149.99, 'Electronics' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM products WHERE name = 'Teclado Mecanico'); INSERT INTO products (name, description, price, category) SELECT 'Monitor 4K', 'Monitor 27 pulgadas 4K', 499.99, 'Electronics' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM products WHERE name = 'Monitor 4K'); INSERT INTO products (name, description, price, category) SELECT 'Webcam HD', 'Camara web Full HD', 79.99, 'Electronics' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM products WHERE name = 'Webcam HD'); INSERT INTO inventory (product_id, quantity, warehouse) SELECT 1, 50, 'Warehouse A' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1); INSERT INTO inventory (product_id, quantity, warehouse) SELECT 2, 150, 'Warehouse A' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 2); INSERT INTO inventory (product_id, quantity, warehouse) SELECT 3, 75, 'Warehouse B' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 3); INSERT INTO inventory (product_id, quantity, warehouse) SELECT 4, 30, 'Warehouse A' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 4); INSERT INTO inventory (product_id, quantity, warehouse) SELECT 5, 100, 'Warehouse B' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 5);" && echo 'Database initialized successfully'
